snippet.title: Lovers in a Dangerous Spacetime | Release Trailer
snippet.description:
Available now on Xbox One and Steam
http://LoversInADangerousSpacetime.com

Lovers in a Dangerous Spacetime is a frantic 1- or 2-player couch co-op action game. Explore a colourful galaxy in a massive neon battleship that you control together by manning turrets, lasers, shields and thrusters. Only through teamwork can you triumph over evil robots, rescue kidnapped space bunnies, and avoid a vacuumy demise. Deep space is a dangerous place, but you don’t have to face it alone!

Website: http://LoversInADangerousSpacetime.com
Twitter: http://twitter.com/AsteroidBase
Facebook: http://facebook.com/LoversInADangerousSpacetime
